'''Radiant Spincrystal 86''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Eye of Deshret]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on some crates near [[Eye of the Sands]].
